body:
Hey everyone!
How is everyone today?
I wanted to ask you a question.

So, I have designed a new skin...(well..I took myworld6 skin and then edited it) :)
But I have noticed a HUGE difference here.

When I was animating minecraft using Blender...the skin was well fixed when I used this format here:
Figure 1.

But because I have changed my skin...the format has changed as well!!!
Here is the format:
Figure 2.

I realized that they use different formats.
Could someone please tell me how I can change Figure 2's format into Figure 1's format please?
Your help would be GREATLY appreciated!
Once again, thank you so much for everything!
I hope to see you in game!
Bye!
Best Regards,


-Athena Su Dimou-

title: Do you notice the difference?

replies.body:
=O

The penguin apocalypse has begun!

There's a difference, though. When I made/customised that skin, I think I used novaskin.me to design it. That may be your best bet.
replies.body_tagged:
=O

replies.body:
Haha...yes...indeed, the penguin apocalypse has begun!
I don't know, but I just ADORE penguins!

But myworld...when you customized/made that skin, in which format did it come?
I'll show you the options:

1st Format:     (the legs do not show)

2nd Format: (the legs show)

It would be great if I can have an answer!
Thank you so much!
See you in game myworld6, DaFrozenBlade, and Orbb_!  :)

-Athena Su Dimou-

replies.body:
The little bottom extra on Figure 2 is the Alex skin setting.

I would use PhotoShop to put the top part of Figure 2 onto Figure 1. That will make the formats the same.
replies.body_tagged:
The little bottom extra on Figure 2 is the Alex skin setting.

I would use PhotoShop to put the top part of Figure 2 onto Figure 1. That will make the formats the same.

replies.body:
Thank you for your suggestion!
If you want to check out how to make the formats same, please make sure to check out my YouTube tutorial.
It is only 4 minutes long!
Here is the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mEUHfmRq5fE
Please leave it a like, and hit the "subscribe" button!
Thank you so much for all of your help and effort!
I hope to see you guys in game!
Bye!
